nodes.text: The GR-9 Plasma Blaster was a model of plasma blaster pistol available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The GR-9 Plasma Blaster was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Mid Rim Explorer Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on June 9, 2015.
